name: Asteroid Miner (jkgaming)
description: This game is made for 2021 ad game jam. In this game you have to collect asteroids to get points. You have to doge the enemies or shoot them with bullets. If you collide with the enemy you lose 5 health. You change the color of your player as well. After you get 50 points a boss will spawn. If you collide with the boss you will lose all your hp. You can shoot the boss with the bullets. You can buy bullets, health and speed from the shop. You can access the shop by colliding with the space station and pressing e. The space station will be at spawn. You can move with arrow keys and shoot with f. A screenshot -
